configFile.fileStream:
services:
  ksql:
    image: confluentinc/ksqldb-server
    environment:
      KSQL_LISTENERS: http://0.0.0.0:8088
      KSQL_BOOTSTRAP_SERVERS: kafka:9092kafka1:9096,kafka2:9096,
      KSQL_KSQL_OUTPUT_TOPIC_NAME_PREFIX: ksql_
      KSQL_KSQL_SCHEMA_REGISTRY_URL: http://schema-registry:8085
      KSQL_KSQL_SINK_REPLICAS: 1
      KSQL_KSQL_STREAMS_REPLICATION_FACTOR: 1
      KSQL_KSQL_INTERNAL_TOPIC_REPLICAS: 1
      KSQL_KSQL_LOGGING_PROCESSING_STREAM_AUTO_CREATE: 'true'
      KSQL_KSQL_LOGGING_PROCESSING_TOPIC_AUTO_CREATE: 'true'
      KSQL_STREAMS_AUTO_OFFSET_RESET: latest
      KSQL_STREAMS_PRODUCER_CONFLUENT_BATCH_EXPIRY_MS: 9223372036854776000
      KSQL_STREAMS_PRODUCER_MAX_BLOCK_MS: 9223372036854776000
      KSQL_STREAMS_PRODUCER_RETRIES: 2147483647
      KSQL_STREAMS_PRODUCER_REQUEST_TIMEOUT_MS: 300000
    ports:
      - '8088:8088'
    container_name: ksql
    depends_on: []
  ksql_schema:
    image: confluentinc/cp-schema-registry
    restart: always
    depends_on:
      - zookeeper1
      - zookeeper2
    environment:
      SCHEMA_REGISTRY_KAFKASTORE_CONNECTION_URL: zookeeper1:2182,zookeeper2:2182,
      SCHEMA_REGISTRY_HOST_NAME: schema-registry
      SCHEMA_REGISTRY_LISTENERS: localhost:8085
    ports:
      - '8085:8085'
    container_name: ksql-schema
  ksql_cli:
    image: confluentinc/ksqldb-cli
    container_name: ksqldb-cli
    entrypoint: /bin/sh
    ports: []
    tty: 'true'
    depends_on:
      - ksql
      - kafka1
      - kafka2
  jupyter:
    image: jupyterhub/jupyterhub
    environment:
      JUPYTER_TOKEN: jupyter
      USERNAME: jupyter
      PASSWORD: jupyter
      JUPYTERHUB_ADMIN: admin
    ports:
      - '8000:8000'
    volumes:
      - jupyterhub_data:/data
    container_name: jupyterhub
  prometheus:
    image: prom/prometheus
    ports:
      - '9099:9090'
    volumes:
      - >-
        /home/zee/Codesmith/OSP/xkite/src/common/kite/download/prometheus/prometheus.yml:/etc/prometheus/prometheus.yml
    container_name: prometheus
  grafana:
    image: grafana/grafana-oss
    ports:
      - '3050:3000'
    restart: always
    environment:
      GF_PATHS_DATA: /var/lib/grafana
      GF_SECURITY_ALLOW_EMBEDDING: 'true'
      GF_AUTH_ANONYMOUS_ENABLED: 'true'
      GF_SMTP_ENABLED: 'true'
      GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_PASSWORD: xkite
    volumes:
      - provisioning:/etc/grafana/provisioning
      - dashboards:/var/lib/grafana/dashboards
    container_name: grafana
    depends_on:
      - prometheus
  zookeeper1:
    image: confluentinc/cp-zookeeper
    environment:
      ZOOKEEPER_CLIENT_PORT: 12182
      ZOOKEEPER_TICK_TIME: 2000
      ZOOKEEPER_INIT_LIMIT: 5
      ZOOKEEPER_SYNC_LIMIT: 2
      ZOOKEEPER_SERVERS: zookeeper1:13888:12888;zookeeper2:23888:22888
      ZOOKEEPER_SERVER_ID: 1
    ports:
      - '12182:2182'
    container_name: zookeeper1
  zookeeper2:
    image: confluentinc/cp-zookeeper
    environment:
      ZOOKEEPER_CLIENT_PORT: 22182
      ZOOKEEPER_TICK_TIME: 2000
      ZOOKEEPER_INIT_LIMIT: 5
      ZOOKEEPER_SYNC_LIMIT: 2
      ZOOKEEPER_SERVERS: zookeeper1:13888:12888;zookeeper2:23888:22888
      ZOOKEEPER_SERVER_ID: 2
    ports:
      - '22182:2182'
    container_name: zookeeper2
  jmx-kafka1:
    image: bitnami/jmx-exporter:latest
    environment:
      SERVICE_PORT: 5556
    ports:
      - '5557:5556'
    volumes:
      - >-
        /home/zee/Codesmith/OSP/xkite/src/common/kite/download/jmx/jmxConfigKafka1.yml:/etc/myconfig.yml
    container_name: jmx-kafka1
    depends_on:
      - kafka1
    command:
      - '5556'
      - /etc/myconfig.yml
  kafka1:
    image: confluentinc/cp-kafka
    restart: always
    environment:
      KAFKA_ZOOKEEPER_CONNECT: zookeeper1:12182,zookeeper2:22182
      KAFKA_LISTENER_SECURITY_PROTOCOL_MAP: METRICS:PLAINTEXT,INTERNAL:PLAINTEXT,PLAINTEXT:PLAINTEXT,KSQL:PLAINTEXT
      KAFKA_INTER_BROKER_LISTENER_NAME: INTERNAL
      CONFLUENT_METRICS_REPORTER_ZOOKEEPER_CONNECT: zookeeper1:12182,zookeeper2:22182
      CONFLUENT_METRICS_REPORTER_TOPIC_REPLICAS: 1
      CONFLUENT_METRICS_ENABLE: 'false'
      KAFKA_HEAP_OPTS: '-Xmx512M -Xms512M'
      KAFKA_BROKER_ID: 101
      KAFKA_JMX_PORT: 9991
      KAFKA_LISTENERS: METRICS://:29092,PLAINTEXT://:9092,INTERNAL://:9095,KSQL://kafka1:9096
      KAFKA_ADVERTISED_LISTENERS: >-
        METRICS://kafka1:29092,PLAINTEXT://localhost:9092,INTERNAL://kafka1:9095,KSQL://kafka1:9096
      KAFKA_OFFSETS_TOPIC_REPLICATION_FACTOR: 2
      KAFKA_TRANSACTION_STATE_LOG_REPLICATION_FACTOR: 2
      CONFLUENT_METRICS_REPORTER_BOOTSTRAP_SERVERS: kafka1:29092
      KAFKA_DELETE_TOPIC_ENABLE: 'true'
    ports:
      - '9092:9092'
    volumes: []
    container_name: kafka1
    depends_on:
      - zookeeper1
      - zookeeper2
  spring:
    image: eclipse-temurin
    restart: always
    ports:
      - '8080:8080'
    environment:
      JAVA_OPTS: ''
      SPRING_CONFIG_LOCATION: /etc/myconfig.yml
      SPRING_KAFKA_BOOTSTRAP-SERVERS: kafka1:9095,kafka2:9095
      SPRING_KAFKA_CONSUMER_BOOTSTRAP-SERVERS: kafka1:9095,kafka2:9095
      SPRING_KAFKA_PRODUCER_BOOTSTRAP-SERVERS: kafka1:9095,kafka2:9095
    command: java -jar /app.jar
    volumes:
      - >-
        /home/zee/Codesmith/OSP/xkite/src/common/kite/download/spring/app.jar:/app.jar
      - >-
        /home/zee/Codesmith/OSP/xkite/src/common/kite/download/spring/application.yml:/etc/myconfig.yml
    container_name: spring
    depends_on:
      - kafka1
      - kafka2
  jmx-kafka2:
    image: bitnami/jmx-exporter:latest
    environment:
      SERVICE_PORT: 5556
    ports:
      - '5558:5556'
    volumes:
      - >-
        /home/zee/Codesmith/OSP/xkite/src/common/kite/download/jmx/jmxConfigKafka2.yml:/etc/myconfig.yml
    container_name: jmx-kafka2
    depends_on:
      - kafka2
    command:
      - '5556'
      - /etc/myconfig.yml
  kafka2:
    image: confluentinc/cp-kafka
    restart: always
    environment:
      KAFKA_ZOOKEEPER_CONNECT: zookeeper1:12182,zookeeper2:22182
      KAFKA_LISTENER_SECURITY_PROTOCOL_MAP: METRICS:PLAINTEXT,INTERNAL:PLAINTEXT,PLAINTEXT:PLAINTEXT,KSQL:PLAINTEXT
      KAFKA_INTER_BROKER_LISTENER_NAME: INTERNAL
      CONFLUENT_METRICS_REPORTER_ZOOKEEPER_CONNECT: zookeeper1:12182,zookeeper2:22182
      CONFLUENT_METRICS_REPORTER_TOPIC_REPLICAS: 1
      CONFLUENT_METRICS_ENABLE: 'false'
      KAFKA_HEAP_OPTS: '-Xmx512M -Xms512M'
      KAFKA_BROKER_ID: 102
      KAFKA_JMX_PORT: 9992
      KAFKA_LISTENERS: METRICS://:29092,PLAINTEXT://:9093,INTERNAL://:9095,KSQL://kafka2:9096
      KAFKA_ADVERTISED_LISTENERS: >-
        METRICS://kafka2:29092,PLAINTEXT://localhost:9093,INTERNAL://kafka2:9095,KSQL://kafka2:9096
      KAFKA_OFFSETS_TOPIC_REPLICATION_FACTOR: 2
      KAFKA_TRANSACTION_STATE_LOG_REPLICATION_FACTOR: 2
      CONFLUENT_METRICS_REPORTER_BOOTSTRAP_SERVERS: kafka2:29092
      KAFKA_DELETE_TOPIC_ENABLE: 'true'
    ports:
      - '9093:9092'
    volumes: []
    container_name: kafka2
    depends_on:
      - zookeeper1
      - zookeeper2
volumes:
  jupyterhub_data:
    driver: local
  dashboards:
    driver: local
    driver_opts:
      o: bind
      type: none
      device: >-
        /home/zee/Codesmith/OSP/xkite/src/common/kite/download/grafana/dashboards
  provisioning:
    driver: local
    driver_opts:
      o: bind
      type: none
      device: >-
        /home/zee/Codesmith/OSP/xkite/src/common/kite/download/grafana/provisioning
